publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3727 Tricia Marwick: Proportional Representation (Local Government Elections) (Scotland) Bill - Stage 1—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Proportional Representation (Local Government Elections) (Scotland) Bill.
